channel.title: Need help with commands and editing
channel.description: ok idk how to edit my stats can anyone geta picture and explain as easyest as possible but i did edit them i said save and when i compile it just goes back to normal stats 1 -.- . and i dont know how to add a ::master command to get all levels 99

item.title: Need help with commands and editing
item.dc:creator: @Java6 Java © ?
item.description:
@Java6 wrote:

You don’t even need to compile when changing stats. Just change them in the .txt file then save and make sure you are logged out then log in and it should all be changed.

If you do exactly what “dog eats dog” said to do you will be fine.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with commands and editing

item.title: Need help with commands and editing
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

i owned u: Turn off your server, exit your client. Change the stats, save the file, run your server, run your client, log in.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with commands and editing
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && (playerRights >= 0)) 
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
sendMessage("maxed cb stats wow!");
}

Theres your master command, And to edit your stats do this.

Step 1 - Go into character folder, And find your name.

Step 2 - In your name you should see:

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0	99	14000000
character-skill = 1	99	14000000
character-skill = 2	99	14000000
character-skill = 3	10	14001155
character-skill = 4	99	14000000
character-skill = 5	99	14000000
character-skill = 6	99	14000000
character-skill = 7	1	0
character-skill = 8	1	0
character-skill = 9	1	0
character-skill = 10	1	0
character-skill = 11	1	0
character-skill = 12	1	0
character-skill = 13	1	0
character-skill = 14	1	0
character-skill = 15	1	0
character-skill = 16	1	0
character-skill = 17	1	0
character-skill = 18	1	0
character-skill = 19	1	0
character-skill = 20	1	0
character-skill = 21	1	0
character-skill = 22	1	0
character-skill = 23	1	0
character-skill = 24	1	0

Thats an Example of what it looks like.

Step 3 - Edit the bit that says : 99 14000000

14000000 is the EXP of the lvl and 99 is the level, Just simply change then to what you want.

Read full topic
